example.title: Output: base.php
example.programlisting:
Class Name $this 'base'
Class Name $objA 'subclassa'
Class Name $objB 'subclassb'
Check $objA->MyMethod true
Check $objA->xx false
Is $objA subclass of YDBase? true
Is $objB subclass of YDBase? true
Is $objB subclass of SubClassA? true
Is $objB subclass of YDRequest? false
Ancestors of $this array ( 0 => 'ydrequest', 1 => 'ydbase', )
Ancestors of $objA array ( 0 => 'ydbase', )
Ancestors of $objB array ( 0 => 'subclassa', 1 => 'ydbase', )
